Articles.Content:
I bought this game in 2012-10-07, and without warning KSP was transferred to Steam and the deadline was March 1st. I tried to download the newest update but it said it was on Steam now, so i logged on to Steam and searched for KSP but i couldn't activate the game, even though it was before March 1st. Now it just says, Transferred to Steam Steam Key: xxxxx-xxxxx-xxxxx but no download button :/

So i guess Squad just stole eighteen dollars from me >

KSP hasn't been transferred to steam, the steam deal was a purely optional promotion.

You should be able to use your KSP store account to log in and download the the KSP store in the same fashion as normal.
But where it said download before it now says transferred to steam and my steam code :/
You must've clicked the transfer to steam option. Anyway, in that case, click "add a game" in steam (bottom left on my system) and copy-paste the steam code there. It should download then.
Someone already activated that code. That sucks

..... did you share the KSP store account? .... if so, you "friend" sniped you.

ps. don't do that.

either that, or you already DID transfer it into you Steam account. ... so download it from steam.
But i don't share the account with anyone, and i'm sure i did not activate it :/

You need to contact [email protected] with all relevant transaction details. We cannot provide Store support from the forums as we do not have access to that information for your security.

Cheers!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
